outputName.title: Auto-populate from
outputName.description: The name of the predefined Destination that will be used to auto-populate collector settings.

bucket.title: S3 bucket
bucket.description: S3 Bucket from which to collect data.

region.title: Region
region.description: Region from which to retrieve data.

path.title: Path
path.description: The directory from which to collect data. Templating is supported, e.g.: myDir/${datacenter}/${host}/${app}/. Time-based tokens are also supported, e.g.: myOtherDir/${_time:%Y}/${_time:%m}/${_time:%d}/

extractors.title: Path extractors

key.title: Token
key.description: A token from the template path, e.g.: epoch

expression.title: Extractor expression
expression.description: JS expression that receives token under "value" variable, and evaluates to populate event fields, e.g.: {date: new Date(+value*1000)}

extractors.description: Allows using template tokens as context for expressions that enrich discovery results. E.g.: given a template /path/${epoch}, an extractor under key "epoch" with an expression {date: new Date(+value*1000)}, will enrich discovery results with a human readable "date" field

awsAuthenticationMethod.title: Authentication Method
awsAuthenticationMethod.description: AWS authentication method. Choose Auto to use IAM roles.

endpoint.title: Endpoint
endpoint.description: S3 service endpoint. If empty, the endpoint will be automatically constructed from the region.

signatureVersion.title: Signature version
signatureVersion.description: Signature version to use for signing S3 requests.

assumeRoleArn.title: AssumeRole ARN
assumeRoleArn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the role to assume.

assumeRoleExternalId.title: External ID
assumeRoleExternalId.description: External ID to use when assuming role.

maxBatchSize.title: Max Batch Size (objects)
maxBatchSize.description: Maximum number of metadata objects to batch before recording as results.

reuseConnections.title: Reuse Connections
reuseConnections.description: Whether to reuse connections between requests, which can improve performance.

rejectUnauthorized.title: Reject Unauthorized Certificates
rejectUnauthorized.description: Whether to accept certificates which cannot be verified against a valid CA (e.g. self-signed certificates).

verifyPermissions.title: Verify bucket permissions
verifyPermissions.description: Disable if you can access files within the bucket but not the bucket itself. Resolves errors of the form "discover task initialization failed...error: Forbidden".

awsApiKey.title: Access key
awsApiKey.description: Access key. If not present, will fall back to env.AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID, or to the metadata endpoint for IAM creds. Optional when running on AWS.

awsSecretKey.title: Secret key
awsSecretKey.description: Secret key. If not present, will fall back to env.AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY, or to the metadata endpoint for IAM creds. Optional when running on AWS.

awsSecret.title: Secret key pair
awsSecret.description: Select (or create) a stored secret that references AWS access key and secret key.
